insufficientPermissions.title: Insufficient Permissions
insufficientPermissions.description: `{name}` requires specific permissions to be executed

cooldown.title: Cooldown
cooldown.description: You cannot use this command for {cooldown}!

wrongChannel.title: Wrong Channel Type
wrongChannel.description: This command cannot be executed in this type of channel!

executionFailed.title: Command Execution Failed
executionFailed.description: The command execution has unexpectedly failed. Please report the following error to the bot devs.

unknownInteraction.title: Unknown Interaction
unknownInteraction.description: This interaction timed out and is no longer available!
